mapper.select: select CNTN_ID, CO_ID, USE_AUTH_TYPE, USE_AUTH_GRP_CODE, USE_AUTH from nw033m
mapper.insert: insert into nw033m(CNTN_ID, CO_ID, USE_AUTH_TYPE, USE_AUTH_GRP_CODE, USE_AUTH) values (#{cntnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{coId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{useAuthType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{useAuthGrpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{useAuth,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
